website_summaries.verdict: A superb chipping net that both golf novices and pros are sure to appreciate.
pros: Fits into a handbag to easily take with you on the go
Perfect choice for use in backyard, office, or any indoor or outdoor setting
3 targets to test your chipping skills
cons: Can't support weight of more than 5 golf balls at once

customer_reviews.title: Great for both indoors and backyard practice.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect practice net for chipping practice. I use it indoors with plastic balls and outside with normal balls. Folds up easily and back in the storage bag. Nice and simple! Everything was as described and made with good quality. I recommend this product and please give a thumbs up if you found this review helpful. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Gadget

customer_reviews.title: Folds up nicely, good for practice balls.
customer_reviews.text: This is likely for use with foam golf balls, because if you're like me and get your first 4 or five balls in the bullseye, the net will lean over as it can't support the weight of more than 4 or 5 actual golf balls.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Guns

customer_reviews.title: Bargain
customer_reviews.text: My golf course driving range/putting green prohibits chipping so I bought this. It works well-- it's small enough to be realistically challenging. My instructor said to practice chipping into a circle the size of a trash can lid. This net is a little bigger than that and has pockets to aim at. It seems to stay put and I haven't knocked it over yet. I suppose if you use a driver or iron you will knock it over or damage it, but it's not made for that. Bottom line, I'm happy with my $19.00 investment.
customer_reviews.author: Hard Worker

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money and a great company!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Great value for the money and very easy to set up and store. When I couldn't remember how to get it back into the protective cover for storage, I contacted them and was immediately sent a video showing clearly and easily how to do it. I can't say enough wonderful things about PodiuMac and their products. We have both the chipping net and the driving net and love them both. They wear well and set up and come down easily.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Allows me to chip continuously indoors
customer_reviews.text: So far I am loving this to practice chip shots in doors. I set it up on our couch or floor across the hall and I'm able to practice chipping with 20+ balls without interruption because of the size of the net holes. It's also very easy to fold back up and put away until I use it again.
customer_reviews.author: SmurphyKate

customer_reviews.title: Backyard Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Father's Day. Super easy to set up and start playing. We bought foam practice balls to use with the target and that worked well. 4 stars, I'm not sure how long it will hold up, it seemed not super sturdy, but if you take care of it, it will proably last.
customer_reviews.author: Kera E

customer_reviews.title: A good chipping net at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I use this net both inside and outside the house. I use real golf balls and i use foam golf balls. For the price I think it is worth it, and I would purchase again. I took off one star though because I wish it was a little sturdier for when I am using it outside. I think it compares very nicely to its competitors out there. I don't know if there is a sturdier net out there, but I will tell you it's doesn't exist for this price. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: MiriamEnergy

customer_reviews.title: Chip like you mean it.....
customer_reviews.text: Great product to use indoors during bad weather or on the road. It has improved my chipping game quite a bit as I use it daily. My improved accuracy around the green is a testimony to its ability to help. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: J. Pepoon

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! With being stuck inside a lot lately I got this with the foam balls and it’s so fun and helps work on the short game. It’s sturdy and decent quality for the price. Haven’t tried with regular balls I assume it would be able to handle a few at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent net for chipping practice
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and customer service. The net comes with stakes which are a plus especially on windy days. I had an issue with one of the rivets and contacted customer service. Since it was within the 3 months since date of purchase, they sent me a new net, no questions asked. At first, I used the practice plastic balls then moved the net outside and started to use real balls. The net works as described and you can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: legomyego16

customer_reviews.title: Very Simple and Productive
customer_reviews.text: After just one week of using, the net is working amazingly. With cold weather approaching, this is great for indoors. A carpet is a great way to use as a mat and practice your inside chipping. Within 1 week, my accuracy and precision has greatly increased. The 5 different chipping areas are great to focus on different types of chips. Easily breaks down into a 12x12in bag and easily stores/transport for practice. Great product for such a great price. Worth every penny for it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt R.

customer_reviews.title: Good value compared to other options.
customer_reviews.text: The price is better than a lot of the other options out there. If you get more than a few balls in the top or middle target it sags some but that’s to be expected for what it is. Love this for practicing my chips in the house during the cold months. Folds up small and mobile.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, holds weight well
customer_reviews.text: This net is awesome. It folds up about the size of a car dash/window cover. It folds up nicely. I was actually nervous because it seemed so small. I just used it at home in the hallway. The top "sweet spot" target held 10 balls without tipping or having issues. Looking forward to taking this to the park to practice. This, and a club, will likely live in my car.
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: Decent not great
customer_reviews.text: This product does what you want it to, it just doesn't stand up straight. Great for chipping in the basement, or outside
customer_reviews.author: kckennedy 36

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I did unpackaged the product but haven't tried it yet. Quality seems to be pretty good and it was easy to unpack and put back into the bag. The price was pretty good... going to order another for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Works for “Golf Pong” too!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised! We use foam practice balls with our grandson so it should last a long time. Easy to setup and take down. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RJC

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Bed!
customer_reviews.text: Have we used it for chipping practice (yet)? No. Does the cat accept and love it? Yes. So far we love that she loves it, and that makes us happy!
customer_reviews.author: Julia M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for myself as I am a beginner golfer and wanted to be able to use this for practice around our yard. Great item - sturdy, easy assembly and perfect for what I want!
customer_reviews.author: natemky

customer_reviews.title: He loved  it
customer_reviews.text: My brother is a golf nut. I would have heard about it if it wasn't very good. I did not assemble it and I don't know how sturdy it is but my brother was pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Barbe

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our father and he loves it ;)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Beeson

customer_reviews.title: Great practice tool, easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, easy setup, practice tool. In a matter of minutes you can be chipping golf balls across your yard or even in the house. 😬 Folds up quick and stored away in the storage back with little to no room.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly sturdy enough!
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but it isn’t sturdy at all! Any ball in the top or middle section starts to collapse the whole thing. I’ll be replacing it with a nicer product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit small and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than I thought. Also, after using it for few weeks, the framing material(thin gauge wire) started leaning to one side and can not get it to stay straight upright.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Rue

customer_reviews.title: Best but
customer_reviews.text: Best buy. I had to use paracord to make a "X" to keep it from tilting BUT the price was 1/3 to a 1/2 of its competitors.
customer_reviews.author: PENNAME

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy beyond a few weeks. Too bad.
customer_reviews.text: I was very exciting and pleased during the first few weeks. It was functional and easy to assemble and disassemble. It’s now been 5 weeks since my purchase, and the netting and support are both falling apart. What would have been a 5 star rating during the first 2 weeks is now down to a 2 and maybe less.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap net
customer_reviews.text: Already ordered a different one just cheap product all around with so many options I guess I picked the wrong one
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this! easily collapses for storage and sturdy enough to hold up to 20 balls before needing to empty it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica F.

customer_reviews.title: Pop up Golf Chipping Net
customer_reviews.text: This is a great net to help me work on my chipping indoors and out! I use the foam golf balls inside which work great!
customer_reviews.author: DMV

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Works well for chipping. Could be slightly better at staying together, but still works even when a pole falls out.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: This is better than corn hole .
customer_reviews.text: Great party game and super pitch trainer when the driving range is not available.
customer_reviews.author: R. Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Durable Chipping Net
customer_reviews.text: This chipping net is awesome! It can be used inside or outside. This net has helped keep my game sharp during rainy days and snowy days. I am so glad I was able to get my hands on one of these! My friends and I have been creating competitions with the chipping net and it has been a blast!
customer_reviews.author: LadyGolfers

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son in law- he loves it. Easy as pie set up. Indoor or out.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R. Koers

customer_reviews.title: Is not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This thing will not sit straight up and leans. We've tried everything to fix it and it still leans to the side. Save your money and get a better version.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleM

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what the description of the product says. I used it on my back yard and it has a perfect size. Good quality materials. It may be a little difficult to assemble back in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Lavignolle

customer_reviews.title: Small, portable, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for practice! Is pretty difficult for beginners but is good practice for accuracy and aim! Great price for the quality,assembly, and easy handling of this product. Portable and able to stay the weather if left out! My husband loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great value for practicing your chips.
customer_reviews.text: Is exactly what it looks like and doesn't fall over. The net seemed to hold up will so far. For the price you really can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Werner

customer_reviews.title: Helps your short chipping game
customer_reviews.text: Got a chipping club, and this helped me home in on using it. Helped me take at least 5 strokes of my game!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Newman

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the time. Constantly falls over and leans almost immediately after use.
customer_reviews.author: Drew I.

customer_reviews.title: Great golf net! I would recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.text: I love using this golf net! It is a great size which enables you to use it almost anywhere! It is perfect for use inside or outside. I know my golf game is going to improve using this product! I would recommend it to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: LMCarl

customer_reviews.title: Good golf chipping target
customer_reviews.text: This item came very easy to set up and helpful with chipping practice.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, falls over, wind knocks it down - would have better success chipping into a laundry basket. Save your money, do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Horselovers1213

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This makes a great gift. Very sturdy and comes with a case.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Twins

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck......great golf tool
customer_reviews.text: We bought this net with the intent of working on my chipping and teaching my son during the winter months. We have enjoyed playing together. It plays well inside with the small waffle balls or with regular golf balls outside. Its held up well so far. Sturdy construction. Bright colors make for great sight lines. Only one complaint...........I need a bigger net for driving lol
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Golf on
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Breaks down to fit in a small bag that was included. Assembles in seconds perfect for chipping practice.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: Simple to set and get started. Does its job. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Haz

customer_reviews.title: affordable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I now own two of these chipping nets the other one is the circle one and works just as great my junior golfers really enjoy it and it makes our lessons more exciting. highly recommended for coaches to use as well as golfers just for every day practice!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Helps a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Works great but it’s very hard to fold up and fit in the bag. The size and pockets are great. Really helps my chipping game.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Chipping net
customer_reviews.text: This net is a little flimsy. for occasional practice it is all right. I would spend more money next time.
customer_reviews.author: James Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: After a week would not stand up correct and now leans to one side
customer_reviews.author: zach wilson

customer_reviews.title: Works well for practice
customer_reviews.text: Works well for practice. A little flimsy, but overall no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old son to practice with. So far it’s held up great and he’s enjoying using it
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great net
customer_reviews.text: Great net. Highly recommend for those who want a quick way to work on chipping.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Practice Mode On!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mini gift for any golfer. I get to practice my pitching and sand wedge shots in my backyard or anywhere inside my house now.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bustos, TexansKevin

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift and it seemed to go over well. It looks like it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good for indoor use
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a little practice this is perfect if you are going to leave it in one location. But it also come with a bag to store it in and take with you. Got the foam balls to practice indoors with
customer_reviews.author: mrivera

customer_reviews.title: 5 of 5 would chip-in again!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little chipping net. Like the additional targets in the center. Would like even more if I had the ability to control the shot to hit them!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Want to improve your score?
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this product and so do our grandsons!
customer_reviews.author: Carol J. Sakstrup

customer_reviews.title: Best chipping net for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best chipping net for the price. Bought during prime days on a whim and love it. If you like sturdy targets that are easy to assemble and take down this is the chipping net for you. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RiBo55

customer_reviews.title: Not mad very well!
customer_reviews.text: It is a little flimsy after several uses, product just broke! Rivet came apart!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Chip up, score low
customer_reviews.text: Works like you would expect for accuracy only practice. Hard to get the feel of speed and how far it would roll but I knew that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny paid!
customer_reviews.text: Really great product! I would never know from the price. Very well made, easy to use, and even slides right into one of the side pockets on my golf (cart) bag! Recommend for sure. Can’t beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas C Colins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like the easy assembly and the toughness of the material . I hammered a driver straight at it first time I used and it and it held up. That’s how I test it. Would highly recommend for the cost .
customer_reviews.author: Steve Landry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend, but their family is really enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: Quyatt1

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Good product easy to setup and serves it's purpose. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Machors

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great price! I was a little early. But it's all made. Eat to set up. A little fussy to close, as are all pop ups. If your looking for a practice tool for chipping, I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Set up in our basement, and he's good to go!
customer_reviews.author: bootlover

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining during Covid
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and set up. Fun to use! I did have to follow the instructions in order to collapse back into bag. Not difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good product for great price
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price... Does what it's supposed to do if you can hit it...
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hindman

customer_reviews.title: Not very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, but it looks flimsy and it keeps titled on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Ning Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Simple and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Simple design, easy to assemble and disassemble. Because of the low price I was concerned about size and sturdiness but both are acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: robert e. mohr

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Gives a good target to aim at. Only dislike is that if a ball hits the side, it has a tendency to collapse.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H Bacon, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Assembles easy and quickly for golf putting fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly and set up very easy and quick. Not so sturdy if using indoors, but has anchors for outdoor use which gives more support. Is a fun product!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after one month
customer_reviews.text: Net is starting to fall apart after less than a month of use. The o ring that holds the rods has completely fallen off and I'm now using duck tape to hold it together.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Priced
customer_reviews.text: This thing is 10$. I would have paid 30. Perfect for basement chipping or backyard
customer_reviews.author: Brian P Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This has been a hit, a bit smaller then expected, but has been fun
customer_reviews.author: Matt T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Product was everything I expected. Started using it immediately. My brother, after trying it, wants to order one for himself! Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Toby

customer_reviews.title: Quality Chipping net
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for indoor or outdoor chipping. It collapses easily, making it easy to store when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: stousey

customer_reviews.title: Do not BUY
customer_reviews.text: This was horrible and a wast of money I wish I could send it back!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Happy husband happy wife!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it. he can practice all the time now in the house
customer_reviews.author: The Johnson's

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensively Awsome!
customer_reviews.text: Super inexpensive compared to others. For what its ment to do it it should last along time!
customer_reviews.author: hunter logan yeates

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fun, fun.
customer_reviews.text: Would have been nice to have an astro turf pad to hit off of.
customer_reviews.author: T Dub

customer_reviews.title: Good tool!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely needed practice, good value, can work on your chipping from multiple distances. Good tool.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Received and operates as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great for practicing as I had hoped. No surprises here.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Spikes

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and super easy to put together! Thanks Podiumax!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Rhule

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool!
customer_reviews.text: It works. Easy setup. Great value. I’ve been practicing everyday with it in my backyard and now I can go up and down like a pro.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Maurer

product_meta.title: PodiuMax Pop Up Golf Chipping Net, Indoor/Outdoor Golfing Target Net for Accuracy and Swing Practice
feature_bullets: 【PRACTICE LIKE A PRO】PodiuMax utilizes three targets in our net design to help improve your short distance chipping accuracy. This is a must-have chipping net for golfers of all levels!
【GOLF ANYWHERE】The net can be packed in a 1.2 ft. handbag, and weighs a mere 1 lbs. Since it’s lightweight, foldable and portable, our net is suitable for indoor/outdoor play anywhere!
【USER FRIENDLY】Our instant pop-up design helps you set up the net in seconds with no tools. All you need is a 25" x 25" x 20" space!
【ENJOY WITH FRIENDS】Set up a game or a friendly match using the three target pockets with your family, friends or colleagues. PodiuMax is a perfect gift for golf lovers.
【NOTE】Installation Video:bit.ly/2mc3uED. We suggest you use golf foam balls to practice with this chipping net.
